lead_paragraph: Signing the veteran Aubrey Huff might have been the steal of the off-season for the Giants. He led the club with 26 homers and 86 runs batted in.
snippet: Signing the veteran Aubrey Huff might have been the steal of the off-season for the Giants. He led the club with 26 homers and 86 runs batted in.

headline.main: Huff Followed Winding Road to World Series
headline.seo: Giants’ Huff Followed Winding Road to World Series
headline.print_headline: Huff Followed Winding Road to Series
